publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-750 Eleanor Scott: Flow Country-That the Parliament notes that the Flow Country constitutes the biggest blanket bog in the world; remembers that significant damage has been done to it, including afforestation at taxpayers' expense, in the past; commends the partners in the Life Peatlands Project for their work on its ecological restoration; notes that bog restoration could reduce Scotland's greenhouse gas emissions by up to 10%, and urges the Scottish Executive to ensure that this national treasure is given the highest possible protection and is reconsidered for nomination to UNESCO as a World Heritage Site.
S2M-750 Flow Country (lodged on 19 December 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-750 Flow Country (lodged on 19 December 2003) Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Patrick Harvie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-750 Flow Country (lodged on 19 December 2003) Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-750 Flow Country (lodged on 19 December 2003) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-750 Flow Country (lodged on 19 December 2003) Rosie Kane*
S2M-750 Flow Country (lodged on 19 December 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
